message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115.  I know it's worth a lot to you, but I'm hoping to get a fair price for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but $110 is my absolute bottom line.  Let me know if you're interested.
